attributes.action: Stop MPs elected in Scotland, Wales and NI from interfering in Engish affairs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scotland has its own parliament to look after its own legislation. Wales has its own assembly. Scottish, Welsh (and Irish) members of the Westminster parliament should abstain from any involvement in purely English matters. The current arrangement is unfair and undemocratic. If the status quo is allowed to continue then there will be an English backlash which could result in the breakup of the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
